pr_title: [GEOT-6514] WMTSService class always returns null for getContactInformation()

timeline.message: GEOT-6514 Updates to enable information from WMTS Getcapabilities calls to pass through to the WMTSService class

timeline.bodyText: What's the rational for removing these additional checks?
timeline.author: ianturton

replies.bodyText: Sorry, accidental, will put them back in
replies.author: singhdan

timeline.message: GEOT-6514 Updates to enable information from WMTS Getcapabilities calls to pass through to the WMTSService class

timeline.bodyText: This needs a check against an empty serviceProvider. In the WMTS spec, the serviceProvder section is optional. Real life example is https://geodata.nationaalgeoregister.nl/tiles/service/wmts?request=GetCapabilities&service=WMTS
timeline.author: singhdan

timeline.message: GEOT-6514 Updates to enable information from WMTS Getcapabilities calls to pass through to the WMTSService class.

Merge pull request #1 from singhdan/GEOT-6514
